channel.title: Serenity F2P [RS F2P REMAKE!]
channel.description:
[center][b]A while ago I started on a F2P source - F2P Remake. It was intended to be how Runescape was, back in '05, but obviously on a free-to-play server. After the project died I decided I must start a new one, using the old base, I bring you Serenity F2P.
I will continue to work on Serenity F2P until I believe it's "Finished", of course it wont be EXACTLY how Runescape was, but it'll get there eventually. I started with the Delta Scape base, do not flame me for this, it has made many tasks so much easier. If you have a problem with Delta Scape, I don't want to hear it. So don't bother posting.[/b]
[u][b]Server Development[/b][/u] 100% NPC Spawns for Varrock, Lumbridge, Falador, and Al Kharid (Only Port Sarim, Draynor and Rimmington to go). 100% Shops for Lumbridge, Varrock, Falador and Al Kharid. Very accurate drop tables. A greater variety of food; Cakes, ALL F2P Fish, Jug of Wines, Red Berry Pie, Bread, etc. Dragon Slayer Quest! No 100% to runescape, but it works, you need it completed to wear Rune, Zamorak, Guthix and Saradomin platebodies. 100% Champions Guild, (Dungeon is P2P!) With Chickens you can kill and cook on the range. As well as the Champions shop upstairs, with rune\black. Oziach sells Rune platebodies and Green Dragonhide platebodies. Cannot use members prayers/teleports/spells.
[u][b]Client Development (I can't code clients, if someone is willing to code add my MSN).[/b][/u] Members Items show up as 'Members Objects'.
[u][b]Media[/b][/u][URL=http://s301.photobucket.com/albums/nn72/localwoodcut/?action=view&current=GFX0001.mp4] Food Eating[/url]
If you want to test, or help with the project in any way add my MSN: the_reaper_x@hotmail.co.uk.[/center]

item.title: Serenity F2P [RS F2P REMAKE!]
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins

@Mendorphins wrote:

Awesome, like it alot. Post some images though to the original post? As the first poster said, we like pictures.

Read full topic

item.title: Serenity F2P [RS F2P REMAKE!]
item.dc:creator: @_J_ava [J]ava
item.description:
@_J_ava wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:8, topic:371022”]In the Devolpment will you actualy be adding it so where if you are member you can wield and go to members areas or is it all F2P {

        [code]        {
        class8.aString170 = "Members Object";
        class8.aByteArray178 = "Login to a members' server to use this object.".getBytes();
        class8.aStringArray168 = null;
        class8.aStringArray189 = null;
        class8.anInt202 = 0;
    }
    return class8;
}[/code]

Im 100% sure this wont works with your client but Its what i use for my “members object codes” you coukld figure out how to imply it your self[/quote]
Their is an easier way to do this without adding unneeded codes into the client.

Don’t forget duel arena is now F2P. Other then that, I’ve added you on Messanger and I’d gladly beta test.

Read full topic

item.title: Serenity F2P [RS F2P REMAKE!]
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

[center][b]A while ago I started on a F2P source - F2P Remake. It was intended to be how Runescape was, back in '05, but obviously on a free-to-play server. After the project died I decided I must start a new one, using the old base, I bring you Serenity F2P.

I will continue to work on Serenity F2P until I believe it’s “Finished”, of course it wont be EXACTLY how Runescape was, but it’ll get there eventually. I started with the Delta Scape base, do not flame me for this, it has made many tasks so much easier. If you have a problem with Delta Scape, I don’t want to hear it. So don’t bother posting.[/b]

Server Development
100% NPC Spawns for Varrock, Lumbridge, Falador, and Al Kharid (Only Port Sarim, Draynor and Rimmington to go).
100% Shops for Lumbridge, Varrock, Falador and Al Kharid.
Very accurate drop tables.
A greater variety of food; Cakes, ALL F2P Fish, Jug of Wines, Red Berry Pie, Bread, etc.
Dragon Slayer Quest! No 100% to runescape, but it works, you need it completed to wear Rune, Zamorak, Guthix and Saradomin platebodies.
100% Champions Guild, (Dungeon is P2P!) With Chickens you can kill and cook on the range. As well as the Champions shop upstairs, with rune\black.
Oziach sells Rune platebodies and Green Dragonhide platebodies.
Cannot use members prayers/teleports/spells.

Client Development (I can’t code clients, if someone is willing to code add my MSN).
Members Items show up as ‘Members Objects’.

Media
Food Eating

If you want to test, or help with the project in any way add my MSN: the_reaper_x@hotmail.co.uk.[/center]
